name: HSP_TX_IMAGING
description: This table contains imaging information from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction with related imaging information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each imaging entry will have its own line.

columns.name: IMAGE_MNEMONIC_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the image mnemonic associated with the hospital billing transaction: e.g., explanation of benefits image.

columns.name: IMAGE_KEY_PAGE_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the key that identifies a particular invoice within an explanation of benefits image.

columns.name: IMAGE_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: Source DCS Record used in creating this HTR from payment posting
